description: Manage Azure Monitor Agent logs integration on an HDInsight cluster.

commands.name: az hdinsight azure-monitor-agent disable
commands.summary: Disable the Azure Monitor Agent logs integration on an HDInsight cluster.
examples: az hdinsight azure-monitor-agent disable --name MyCluster --resource-group rg

commands.name: az hdinsight azure-monitor-agent enable
commands.summary: Enable the Azure Monitor Agent logs integration on an HDInsight cluster.
examples: az hdinsight azure-monitor-agent enable --name MyCluster --resource-group rg --workspace WorkspaceId --primary-key WorkspaceKey

commands.name: az hdinsight azure-monitor-agent show
commands.summary: Get the status of Azure Monitor Agent logs integration on an HDInsight cluster.
examples: az hdinsight azure-monitor-agent show --name MyCluster --resource-group rg
